name: My Light In The Darkness | Demo (Clive)
name_original: My Light In The Darkness | Demo (Clive)
description:
My Light In The Darkness

The worlds first and only flashlight dating simulator!

Hello Wanderer.

It seems you've found yourself  in the Black.

What's the Black you ask?

 Ah, you don't remember how you got here... Curious...

The Black is a world of total darkness revolving around the Core Light. If you want to get your memories back you'll need to brave the mysteries of the darkness to reach it.

However, it's dangerous to go alone and I won't be able to join you. 

Perhaps Flashlight, Lantern, or Pocket here will be willing to accompany you, though they may need some... convincing.  

Don't be shy. Walk over and introduce yourself.

MLITD is a surreal adventure based around player choice. Who you decide to bring along and your decisions with them create unique variations and opportunities to unravel the mysteries of who you are and this world of shadow you must traverse.

This demo was built in 8 weeks as a "Flashlight Dating Simulator" and incorporates a stripped down version of the final game's first 2 chapters. It currently contains 7 different endings, each having multiple variations based on your choices. 

The Team

My Light In The Darkness is being developed by Mark "Clive" Svetik. The creator and maintainer for CharityLiveStream.com. 

Development is ongoing but sporadic, due to the ground-up rebuild of the CLS website, but this demo receives updates as new segments for the first 2 chapters are implemented.
